Police say Marquis McCray , 25 , and Darnell Gilbert , 24 , both of Sheffield , broke into Florence Pharmacy on Veterans Drive early Monday .
Police responded to an alarm at the business shortly after 4:30 a.m. A K - 9 unit led officers to the suspects in a nearby wooded area .
